author: CBR
description:
These superhero movies were a turning point for the genre. In this episode of the Heroes Journey Podcast, Sean O’Connell and Sierra Nutkevitch rewatch Deadpool, Captain America: Civil War, Batman v Superman, and X-Men: First Class to see what still holds up in 2026.

Heroes Journey Podcast Episode 13 is a straight rewatch audit: what still feels fresh, what feels dated, and why these superhero movies shaped the next decade of Marvel and DC. Our hosts dig into why X-Men: First Class still works as a "new beginning," why Deadpool’s low-budget constraints actually sharpen its romance, why Civil War’s airport showdown still delivers peak MCU teamwork, and why Batman v Superman still hits as the decade's debate magnet.

Chapters
00:00 – 10-Year Anniversary Rewatch Setup
02:55 – X-Men: First Class (15 Years Later): Why It Still Works
09:49 – Deadpool (10 Years Later): The Passion Project That Changed Everything
16:14 – Captain America: Civil War (10 Years Later): Spider-Man and Black Panthe
title: 10th Anniversary: Deadpool, Civil War, Batman v Superman Revisited | Heroes Journey EP 13
